title: Volume On The Chart
content:
The indicator is a complete analogue of the Volume indicator, except that it is displayed not in a separate panel, but at the bottom of the chart.

To add and set up the indicator, open the Indicators settings window.


Indicator's settings

Settings

NameDescription
Height Determines the height of the displayed panel.

Calculation

NameDescription
Type Represents one of the available data source types.

Options:
  • Volume
  • Ticks
  • Ask
  • Bids

Filter

NameDescription
Use filter Determines whether to use this filter in calculations.
Filter Volumes that are less than the value set in this filter will be ignored.
Color Defines the color for the element that does not pass the filter.
Use alerts Enables or disables the sound notification.
Alert File This parameter allows users to specify the name of a custom audio file for alert sounds. Users can select a WAV file that will be played whenever an alert condition is triggered. The chosen WAV file should be located in the folder C:\Program Files (x86)\ATAS Platform\Sounds.

Volume values

NameDescription
Show Show volume values on bars (in cluster mode)
Color Sets the color of the label text.
Location Specifies the display location of the label.

Options:
  • Up
  • Middle
  • Down
Font Specifies various settings for the font.

Reverse alert

NameDescription
Enabled Appears on divergences(candle is positive and delta is negative or visa versa)
Alert File This parameter allows users to specify the name of a custom audio file for alert sounds. Users can select a WAV file that will be played whenever an alert condition is triggered. The chosen WAV file should be located in the folder C:\Program Files (x86)\ATAS Platform\Sounds.

Drawing

NameDescription
Delta colored Determines whether to color elements according to their delta value.
Positive Displays the color of an element with a positive value.
Negative Displays the color of an element with a negative value.
Neutral Sets the color for elements with a neutral direction.
